name: David Goodwin
text: Highly skilled machinest all of them ,great people master at their craft.

name: David Goodwin
text: Highly skilled machinest all of them ,great people master at their craft.

name: David Goodwin
text: Highly skilled machinest all of them ,great people master at their craft.

name: David Goodwin
text: Highly skilled machinest all of them ,great people master at their craft.

name: English Farms
text: Mike is one of the top fabricators in the area. They turn out precision parts for wood and pulp Mills like dampets vortexes etc med to large type pieces. Great person to do business with. They also do custom Fab work .

name: Christopher Lindsey
text: Jim is knowledgeable and really funny.  He is focused on the work. My hydraulics come here to be repaired. I wouldn't even consider going any other place.

resp.text: Thank you Chris!

name: Krash Hamilton
text: Great people that are dedicated to perfection.

name: Blake Powers
text: Price  gouging at its best!!!  They had one guy working 5 hours of wo $1900!  On top of that they were supposed to meet us at 8:00 AM on Saturday morning and showed up at 11. It cost us a whole day of work.  Save yourself by not making this mistake !  The job should’ve been $400.  I’m taking this to the better business bureau.

name: Eddie Kiser
text: Great people to have working for you. Sam was an excellent help after hours got us back going quick. No one eles will get my business while working in this area.

resp.text: Thank you.  I will tell Sam of your kind words!

name: Bill Yancy
text: Just excellent service. I left my backhoe's leaking arm cylinder here and JimPam had it ready for me in 2 days, and at a better price for new seals than I've EVER gotten. It works like brand new now, Jim's experience speaks for itself

resp.text: Thank you! I'm glad we were able to get you up and running quickly!

name: Chuck Linderman
text:
They do jobs nobody else can. The Hydraulic manifold on my Russian Belarus 250AS was in need of an overhaul. Every where I took it said trash it, buy another or wouldn't even consider attempting to rebuild it.
Jim was able to do the job for a fair price and saved me a lot of time and money. Check them out !!

resp.text: Thanks Chuck! It was a pleasure meeting you, and thank you for the comment!

name: Robyn Z
text: Excellent, friendly, professional, and very clean shop. And fast services. I won't go anywhere else for my hydraulic services. Thanks Jim your awesome!

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks so much!

name: franklin mitchell
text: Check with Jim before you buy the rebuilt kit from dealer. A friend told me about  Jimpam. Now ill tell all in need of repair where to go. Excellent  experience

resp.text: Thank you! We are usually able to buy parts, seals, etc for less than what our customers could buy the item for.  We pass that savings on to our customers.  Thanks for your review!

name: Mike Smith
text: Totally ruined a hydralic lift unit.Still to this day unable to use! Should have been told but i guess they were more into money than customer.

name: Mike S
text: Best tech in the southeast. If no one else can do it, Jim can!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to say!  We appreciate your business!

name: jamie alexander
text: This guy does the best machine work of any shop I have ever used. He has been in the business for a long time, and knows more than most other shops. His prices beat the other guys on pretty much every job.

name: James Hill
text: Had a stripped spark plug hole in cylinder head and they were able to fix it in no time. Very professional and fairly priced.

name: Jonathan Rogers
text: Have had multiple ATV cylinders bored here, PERFECT jobs!

name: pamela “pamelascot” lul
text: Greg is the best!

name: Timestream76
text: They did a terrific job on my Subaru EJ25 block, crank, and heads.

name: Tracy Metcalf
text: Place was very crowded, bit clean. Will say more after I get my crank back.

name: Eve R. (Naturalista Eve)
text: Great place my motor looks brand new.

name: Wilfredo Izquierdo
text: I have been taking my heads and blocks to this particular place since 2010. They range from Kia's, to Acura's, to Ford 302, and I admire the work of Allen ( foreman ) and his crew. I like how the crew always shows me when there is a problem, and how they going to go on about it to fix the problem. A very long time ago, they short blocked a B18 Acura and that car ran forever and even drove it back and forth to Miami FL a whole bunch of times. I don't know what I and a lot of people would do if they ever retired and closed the doors. The only thing I would say to a prospective customer is to call ahead as they are always slammed packed, or make sure you have a spare car until they can fix you up, because it can set you back ( time ) a little bit. But call Allen first. Other than that, their work is flawless and they have never let me down. Good job Allen and Crew you guys are the best in Birmingham and can't beat those prices!!

name: Joey Stearman
text:
I give 2 stars because they did eventually replace what they broke on my cylinder head.
They are cheap, not thorough and 2k miles of driving later my chain tensioner snapped because these fellas didn't find it necessary to mention anything. They kept my head for months and basically tried to tell me I brought the head in with all the plastics parts broke. Use at your own risk! Costly mistake!

name: John Bertram
text: Best service... best prices... awesome people!! Ask for Allen

name: Tom G
text: Great staff, very friendly and knowledgeable

name: Justin Mooney
text: Quick turnaround time, once they start work, they stay busy. Decent price too. The men there are knowledgeable and hard working. Call in advance as they stay busy.

name: Tyler Benjamin
text: Nice people

name: Avery Shanklin
text: Great group of guys. Love their work

name: Dennis Gamble
text: You know that they do good work because the line is long.

name: Kevin Keller
text: Great service great work great prices all over great business!!!

name: Timbo Cheez
text: htey put a timing gear on and made it look easy

name: Joseph Cole
text: 5 star review speaks for itself

name: James Roper
text:
Its gonna take one day !!
Did not even start the job after 3 days so I pickup my heads and take them somewhere else not very good people very rude

name: Rob Robbins
text:
Drove all night to be there when they opened at 6:00. Dropped off what I needed to be machined and waited.  They couldn't fix it so they made a brand new one and I was going back to Florida by 3:00.
Great people.

resp.text: Thanks Rob!  So glad we could help you guys!!  We appreciate your business!!!

name: Merrix Watson
text: Busy Place. But shipping and receiving was quick . Good staff as well

name: James Harris
text: Good people and good work

resp.text: Thank you for your business!!!

name: Bman16
text: Awesome place, great people, Gary is a very knowledgeable person, he has a huge amount of experience in a lot of different areas. Always a great experience when we use Jones Welding! Gary and his team have got or company out of a tight spot more than once, always great with meeting deadlines!

name: Valen montano
text: The staff are nice and they work very good

name: Brandon Jackson
text: Courteous and helpful staff. Reasonable rates also

name: Clive Armstrong
text: Friendly and polite good business attitude

name: Tony Bright (robohiker42)
text: Always have what I need. Prices are compatible.

name: Jimmy R Tuck
text: This is our yard.. Don't know why it has this name

name: Edwin Wells
text: Friendly, quick in & out for semis.

name: Earnest Gann
text: Great people, quick service

name: Justin P
text: Difficult to find, road sign is missing for the road name and the road is on the backside of a hill. Staff wasn't in the office and had to wait for a loader for assistance.

name: Christian Dipp
text: Very quick unload. You can possibly stay the night before the gate entrance to the right side of the road. I got here at 7:15am thinking they’d open up at 8am but, to my surprise they took me right in.

name: Scott Shires
text: Friendly crew, got me in and out very quickly without sacrificing quality. They know how to load a truck properly.

name: Tom Hess
text: Fast loading, nice guys

name: David Carlson
text: Great place to unload

name: Thomas Shirland jr
text: Guys were great got unloaded really fast

name: Jerri Riggins
text: Friendly staff, mostly no waiting long,  and unloading is fast. Pre - load are here too for certain companies with contractor.

name: Andreanna Davis
text: They are absolutely wonderful! I took in my Dad’s 1993 Ford Lightning. We had been having trouble with it going dead and just not running right. Several other local mechanics had tried to fix it with little success. I read about Hesco and decided to give them a try. I’m so glad I did. They got Dad’s truck running perfectly! I will never let anyone else work on it again. They do a great job and great work! I just can’t thank them enough for all they did. Would recommend them highly to anyone.

name: Rick Clark
text: I bought a lotus and it was delivered with a flat tire.  Jeff came out to my house picked up the tire and brought it back the next day to put the tire on and check the pressure in the rest of the tires. He was happy to answer any question I had!  Amazing customer service!  A+!  I will be using them for the service of my car.

name: jeffrey vaughn
text: I grew up next door to Jeff. I remember a day when I looked out and saw a 2nd gen camaro with a blower sitting a foot out of the hood. It was Jeff. I was a kid and did the burnout hand signal..to which he happily obliged. Worked with his lil sis many years later and he still remembered. Genuinely thoughtful and kind dude who exudes knowledge.

name: Bailey Ike
text: The customer service is outstanding, the people working there feel authentic and give the impression they truly care.

name: Radioman
text:
Jeff @ HESCO is unparalleled in his infinite wisdom behind the wheel and under the hood of a car. He has been known to pull a rabbit out of a hat on many occasions. I would not hesitate to take any of my vehicles to him for any reason.
Thanks, Jeff-
Tim @ Rickwood Radio Service

name: Eric Morin
text: At last found a shop to work on my Mazda RX-8 R3 with a twin rotary. Honest diagnosis and job well done. Think it runs better than when I bought it! Thank you Jeff and crew!

resp.text: Thank you for the outstanding feedback, Eric! We are so glad that you were able to find a shop that fit your auto needs, we look forward to working with you and your RX-8 again!

name: Charles B Ireland
text: I have been taking my machine work to Hesco for many years. Best machine shop anywhere. Now that I no longer work on my own vehicles, I intend to entrust them with their care.

resp.text: Charles, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. It is a pleasure to work see you in our machine shop. We are so glad we have gained your long term trust! Let us know if there is anything we can assist you with!

name: Nichole Posten
text: As someone indicated, they do a lot of specialty high end vehicle work but it has been well worth the extra to know that the work is done right.  I have been taking my now 10yr old (beater) Jeep here for 8+ years and will take my new Subaru here.  Joe is great and always has the time to spend explaining anything to you.  He even took my husband and son around the shops to look at all of the cars there.

resp.text: Thank you for your loyalty over the years Nichole, we truly appreciate it!

name: Stephen Wilson
text: These guys do some of the best work in Birmingham. That being said, when you see the Ferraris and classic cars in the parking lot you know you are going to pay a price that matches their level of quality work. Don't let the abrasive or lack of communication keep you from at least getting a written quote from their shop. On a side note, get someone to show you around their facility because it is basically an ever changing museum of mechanical genius. Custom builds, daily drivers, etc it's a pretty cool spot in the heart of downtown. If all else fails, you can walk to Good People Brewery or Regions Park  and drink away your sorrows.

resp.text: Thank you for the good review, Stephen! We appreciate getting your feedback and we hope next time we can deliver a 5-star experience!

name: Lindsay Hobbs
text:
I have nothing but good things to say about Hesco and the people working there! My husband and I were driving from Utah to Atlanta when our car broke down in Birmingham. Even though they were busy, they fit us in and got us back on the road the next day! Not only did they fix our car, but they went above and beyond to make sure that we were taken care of while we were stuck in the city. They even called us a few days later to make sure we had made it to our destination safely and without any problems!
We are SO grateful for Jeff, Joe, and everyone else who took such good care of us! This was by far the best experience we have ever had with a mechanic, and would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you for the excellent review, Lindsay! We are glad you arrived safely, and we can't thank you enough for all the kind words. Our goal is to provide our customers with an unbeatable experience every time!

name: Prentice Jones
text: One of my best friends works at this shop so I know they are an A+ shop because Warren is a very good tech.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review! We are so glad to have Warren on our team! We appreciate the great recommendation!

name: Jacob Hobbs
text: These are the kind of guys that would take their shirts off their backs to help you. Highly recommend to anyone who appreciates honest and high quality work!

resp.text: We appreciate the great review, Jacob. That is exactly who we strive to be. Thank you for your business, and we hope to see you again!

name: James Gavin
text: On a recent trip from Birmingham back to Atlanta my 2012 Hyundai Equus ran hot about 30 miles outside of Birmingham, we got off at exit 147 wound up having to get it towed back to Birmingham. I didn't know a mechanic in B'ham so I had it delivered to J.B. a Buick dealership, they inspected it for $309 and said that I at the least had a blown head gasket caused by a bad water pump and that it was going to cost me $2215  for them to break down the engine and make sure that there was no further damage with the engine,  and that it could be as much as $4500 to replace all the gaskets through out the engine. NOT TODAY!!! So I did a Google search and came across HESCO, the reviews were great, I spoke with Joe Molina and he arranged to have it tower to HESCO "DESPITE being in the middle of changing locations", they got it in checked it out, started it up, "No white smoke from the tail pipe", turned out to be the water pump, THAT's ALL. I can't recommend Joe Molina and the guys at HESCO Automotive highly enough, they are highly professional, extremely efficient, keep you informed at every juncture of the process, and very reasonable. I am telling ALL my friends and family to take their vehicles to HESCO Automotive. Thanks guys, this was a very stressful situation as I was having to take care of it from Atlanta, Joe you could not have been better.

resp.text: Thank you James! It is great to hear from you and glad we could help you out.  We want to make sure all of our costumes are taken care of and are aware of the repairs needed for their vehicle. We are glad you found us and we could located the problem to your water pump. We truly appreciate your recommendation. Give us a call if you have questions or need anything in the future!

name: Ron Denney
text: I had a bolt sheared off inside my BMW motorcycle wheel. I called Wesco from Hoover and explained the situation and that I lived 90 miles south in Dadeville, AL. I spoke with Joe on the phone. He said bring it in and they would see what they could do for me. They used an easy out to remove the bolt for me quickly and wouldn't even take any money for this service. Great people at WESCO!

resp.text: We really appreciate the excellent review, Ron. We are happy to help. Let us know if there is anything else we can help you with!

name: Ray Clark
text: I have a Z-3 and a 535i and would not let anyone else touch them in Birmingham.  I used to go to Tom Williams for items under warranty and they always found something to fix that did not need fixing.  Anything Joe, Jeff and his folks say, I trust completely.

resp.text: Ray - We cannot thank you enough for your business and the great review! We appreciate being able to work with you.

name: Dawn Brook
text: I took my wife's 07 Murano in for a few repairs and got the same great service as all the exotics Hesco works on. Great guys and service.

resp.text: Roy - Thank you for the great review! It is always a pleasure to be able to work with you and we cannot thank you enough for your business.

name: Katie munkus
text: I was very disappointed with this business. I had to have my car towed here the Wednesday before Thanksgiving. I was told that I would get a detailed estimate the following Monday. I was fine with that. When I called Monday I was told that they had already started replacing and fixing the damaged parts to my car without my permission and without my knowledge. So I specifically said please stop working on it until I get the detailed estimate I was promised and had looked it over. The next day I decided to have my car towed to a different shop that specializes in Volkswagen and Audi cars. When I called Hesco to tell them what I had decided they informed me that my car was almost completely finished. The owner made a decision without my permission yet again and without calling to inform me what was going on. I was highly disappointed that every decision made about my car was made without my input or knowledge. And that my request for them to stop the repairs was completely ignored. This business is very unprofessional and lacks the ability to communicate with their customers. I also feel that I was taken advantage of because I am a woman. Not to mention the repairs done to my car were done wrong. I ended up having to have all the transmission fluid drained and replaced bc they used a brand that is not recommended for German cars. I also had to have the tires rebalanced and aligned bc Hesco didn't properly do that either. I do not recommend this business to anyone.

name: Douglas Smith
text: Apparently Jim Burke Subaru won't work on modified Subaru's (so basically every WRX)... Hesco came through and even purchased the updated software so that they could diagnose my car. Skip Jim Burke and take your modified Subie here.

resp.text: Thank you for the great feedback Douglas, we are glad we were able to help when others fell short.

name: T Adams
text: These guys are truly great!

resp.text: Thank you, Rai for the 5-stars and kind words! We greatly appreciate it.

name: John Waldo
text: Don't take your Eaton supercharged vehicle here.

name: Tint Pro
text: I had a very small project of putting holes in  sheet of stainless. Most large companies would not of been interested in helping me, but J.R. @ Bayliss took the time and hooked me up. Great customer service from beginning to end. Everyone was very friendly and the service was exceptionally fast! Highly recommended.

name: David Fox
text: Quick and professional.

name: Roland Serb
text: Called me at 12 in the morning. That’s terrible.

name: GLloyd Philpo'tt
text: Great help with tremendous capability.

name: James C Gibson
text: Best place for any thing you need automotive, machine shop, hydraulic hoses up to 2 inch, fast friendly service

name: Clay Ponder
text: I came through here today to get some quick disconnect pieces for an air hose assembly. The service was absolutely amazing and the gentleman I talked to was super helpful. I don't normally leave reviews but this place really deserved it. Thanks y'all!

resp.text: Thanks Clay, for the review.  We really appreciate it.

name: Jeff Hall
text: Very nice people. Very helpful service. One of a kind place.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.

name: Joshua Fields
text: Jack the owner has a lot of  knowledge and always goes the extra mile to get you back on the road. Highly recommended

resp.text: Thanks for the review.

name: Jeremy Kellett
text: Great Part store Add a good place to  buy metal

resp.text: Thanks Jeremy, for the review.

name: Jason Arensman
text: Great home town store . very helpful and kind.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Kevin Torbert
text: The people here are very knowledgeable and polite

resp.text: Thank you Kevin for the review!

name: Ty Barton
text: Very nice experience

resp.text: Thank you Ty, for the review.

name: K Z
text: best Price for replacement parts 👍

name: Roy “R” C
text:
This place is the rare epitome of small town Auto Parts that'll help you get running again.  They are friendly and will help you get the right part for your automotive needs, the parts that I had bought at other parts stores failed me, after getting the parts here my truck runs better than ever.I've made it a point to always start here when looking for parts I need.
HIGHLY RECOMMEND  !!

resp.text: Thank you Roy, we strive to offer great quality at a fair price.

name: Chip Gregg
text: They have never let me down with any of my needs, even the hard to find/do

name: Aeon Hale
text: Great staff.  Good prices for a small shop.

name: Andrew Monaghan
text: Hance Auto Parts is my favorite auto parts store.  I am not a professional mechanic but I am learning how to do things I used to pay someone else to do.  Jack and his wife are very gracious, kind, and, best of all, patient!  Just the other day, I had to replace a front drive axle on my wife's Subaru.  They had the part in stock and made sure I had all of the small parts needed to correctly do the job.  Jack even answered some novice questions for me.  It really helped me maintain the confidence I needed to get the job done.  And, in case you are wondering, their prices are in line with everyone else and they can get the parts you need if they do not have them in stock.  They also do machine shop work and Jack has a super cool water jet metal cutting machine in the back that he might show you if you are lucky.  I highly recommend these people and their store.

name: angjminer
text: Thanks to the good folks at Hance auto parts in magnolia springs, I am now finished with a repair that could have easily cost me twice as much on my truck. This may sound like a commercial, but they deserve every bit of praise they get. when you go to Hance for your automotive / machining needs you will never be disappointed. they have been around for as long as I can remember, and the telephone number hasn't changed since I was a teenager. If you work on your own vehicle, and live in the area, this is where you go.

name: Steve Allen
text: The best

resp.text: Thanks for the review.

name: Jimmy Smalley
text: These guys here will absolutely bend over backwards for you .I personally know the owners .And friend let me just say.When you leave there if your not happy Well you must have stomped your toe.Because these guys will make you happy.

resp.text: Thank you Jimmy, we love your review and agree totally.

name: Johnny Carnley
text: Awsome auto parts store

resp.text: Thank you Johnny for the review.

name: Roy Slade
text: Very knowledgeable, extremely helpful great place for the parts you need

name: Theresa Gaignard
text: Jack was really friendly and kind.  I called him from Boston after the big April 29 storm because I was trying to find someone in the area to tell me what the conditions on the ground were like.  I couldn't get through to my mother, who lives near the Post Office, or through to anyone else in the area, but I kept trying.  I got on Google Maps to see if I could find any local businesses and found Hance Auto Parts.  As chance would have it, they have an extra DSL line, so their phones were still working.  He assured me that the area where my mother lives in Magnolia Springs was fine.  It was so nice to talk to a man with southern charm and kindness.  THANK YOU!!

name: Ben Griffiths
text: Local auto supply for parts, repairs and custom fabrication. Nice line of parts for automotive, agricultural, and heavy applications, including trucks. Good prices on parts and work. Come see Jack for repairs and fabrication in their full machine shop. If he can't do it (which seems to be rare) he will help you find an answer. They only do limited engine work. Friendly family run business, coffee and doughnuts in the morning. Open till 5:30 PM.

name: joni baecher
text: Very knowledgeable staff and excellent prices!

name: KC Safiran
text: Great local auto part store. Friendly people and very helpful.

name: gpriceco price
text: Great service for machine work especially on head resurfacing

name: Kim Tracey ella
text: If hances ain't got it, can't make it, or fix it ,well just maybe you really don't need it anyway besidea every re i go they got fresh coffee and a donut laying around love handed for my truck,my car, my rvs .......

name: Bo Weeks
text: These folks are always on top of my needs with over the top service and knowledge of automotive  and metal fabrication ,check them out on your next need and I'm sure they will please

name: Sammy Glasgow
text: Knowledgeable staff and great service

name: Steve Hartsock
text: Great place

name: NoNo Lx
text: Very nice employees

name: Rick Wieland
text: Jack

name: Custom Engravings By Hunter Short
text: Love this place

name: David Sparks
text: Very help full

name: RZR _
text:
(Translated by Google) Good service thanks

(Original)
Buen  servicio gracias

name: vipatsov vipatsov
text: If you have delivery here,go straight than turn  right to Sharp st. Very fast unloading.

name: Mark Toland
text: Best Fabrication and CNC company around. Great people very nice and very helpful. Made arrangements to have some special custom work done.

name: Ted Sharp
text: I had an air dryer that needed some aluminum welding, I talked to several welding shops and they were the only one that told me they could fix it while I waited. Not only did they fix it there repair was superior compared to two repairs I had previously. Would give a 10+ great people great work.

name: Timothy Johnston
text: Always a pleasure to visit Edwards Design and Fabrication

name: Abby Edwards
text: Very hard-working family business. Would recommend 10/10.

name: bennie perdue
text: Friendly people.

name: Brandon Downing
text: Great people to work with. Friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brandon!

name: Kyle Adams
text: Great company, high values, good work.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kyle!
Thank you!

name: Thomas Tolliver
text: Fantastic Machine Shop with great customer service and even better pricing.  Truly a wonderful addition to the Alabama machine and steel services.

name: Farontha Booker
text: Super friendly staff was more than helpful to get a driver there.

name: Shane Gallahair
text: This place you better run. Came here at twelve appointment was for two pm. Now there saying my stuff want be ready until 8or 9pm still waiting. But the young lady in office is very nice only reason they got one star. Plenty of parking if you need to sleep

name: Roger Flanders
text: Appointment time doesnt mean anything. Employees are more focused on socializing than working just like in most places in Mississippi then cry the blues when held up away from their work and too stupid to tie it together. He will show no mercy to those who are what they oppose. At dock 2 1/2 hrs after appointment and not being loaded with no one at the docks. I  anticipated this before i get the call to come to the docks. Its like lets not be obvious..... yeah to the guy who suffers from multidimensional blindness.

name: Jagdev Singh
text: Bring your food. It's been 6 hours still waiting for door

name: D Hunter
text: Not here.  It is about a half mile west on industrial parkway.

name: Moto Giant
text: Down to earth, friendly and reasonably priced

name: brett davis
text: Very nice Guys! ..I dropped my Head off (miata VVT 1.8 ) and they wasted no time .  Price was very reasonable as well. I'll do return business! Thanks Guys !

name: Dale Baker
text: In 2009 Cliff and Ben rebuilt a 327 cubic inch straight eight engine for my 1951 Packard.  It was a pleasant experience in every way.  I found them to be knowledgeable, skilled, cooperative and affordable.  They took no short cuts and got an outstanding result.  Five years later it performs in every way a Packard should.

name: James Roper
text: Great price great people fantastic work best place to go for automotive work

name: johnny bigmack13
text: Nice polite people but be sure to bring your lunch, if your delivering here it tends to take all day just to set off a few bundles 👎

name: Max Ve
text: If you want to spent on loading 5-7 hours- you are welcome 😁

name: Christopher Cain
text: Rates are good but load times are horrible!!!!  If they had a place for the loaded trucks to move to tarp after getting loaded that would help a great deal!!!  As it is you get loaded and you have to tarp where they load you which holds up the next truck getting loaded!!

name: Dalia Pena
text: They take about 3 hours to loaded a truck after been waiting for 2 hours  . I dont know why they require an appointment.

name: Anthony H
text: I loaded at building 7 which is on the right side when coming down the street. Was loaded immediately, no wait at all.

name: Lone Wolf
text: Judging by the attitude and rudeness of the employees in shipping and receiving, this must be a horrible place to work.

name: Eric Gibson
text: Shipping doesn't get in till 8am not 6am when receiving does

name: Robert “Jack” McCutcheon
text: Fast and friendly unload

name: Николай Бабич
text: Slower and worse workers will be difficult to find.  Loaded all day.

name: Andy Specht
text: Very, very slow. Plan on several hours. They don't have a scale on site.

name: Codax inc
text: Good people . Decent place for PU for fb.

name: Reynold Payret
text: 5 hours to charge SLOW

name: John Messing
text: Been there often ( Combined transport) never had a problem. In and tarped two hours...

name: Grigore Bozu
text: 5 h wating to get the loud

name: larry Evans
text: I was there for 6 1/2 long hours getting loaded. I watched 4 so called bosses sit in the office and laugh and just bs. While the guys loading were out there poking around. There is no reason to take that long to load anyone.  I WILL NEVER GO BACK....

name: Serega Yjin
text: after 5 1/2 hours of waiting began to ship...

name: randy taylor
text: Been sitting here 2hrs already and they haven't even started unloading me. Sitting in a bay and everything. The employees are very rude and like to talk down to you. I have no plans on returning ever.

name: Charles Whaley
text: This place is slow. Wise idea, unload the trks that are here waiting to be unloaded first before you start loading a spot trailer or maybe have two people. One to unload and one to load. Drivers using electronic logs will burn up their 14 hr clock here.

name: Mark
text:
I was having problems with my 2014 Dodge 6.7 diesel.  Stopped at City Diesel while traveling from Kentucky to Florida.  They are normally very busy but they got me in the shop and back on the road in just a few hours.  Highly recommend this company if you want top notch work.  My turbo actuator is working perfectly now since it was replaced. The truck pulls great and the exhaust brake works better than ever.
Big thanks to the crew at City Diesel!!

name: James Scarbrough
text: Quality work done in a timely manner.

name: John Blankenship
text: Awesome company to do business with..highly recommend

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback! Let us know if we can do anything to help you.

name: John Bell II
text:
Outstanding work done on my 6.0, Bennett Clark, called and explained what work was done. He is very knowledgeable and explained my engine and it's repair in understandable terms.
I have been doing business with City Diesel since 1999, they know Diesel engines! They are very honest and reliable , great mechanical business. I can not say enough about them being trustworthy and reputable, I highly recommend City Diesel.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  We do appreciate hearing back from our customers.  I'll let Bennett know you were pleased.

name: Jane Smith
text: Were supposed to do an entire motor rebuild and instead replaced very few parts new resulting in an engine failure .. terrible costumer service.. just a plain rip off

resp.text: Jane Smith, is that the name you did business with us under?  I do not have any record of any transaction and we keep great records.  On the off chance that this is a real review under a pseudonym we keep excellent records and have a good warranty policy and any engine repair we did would be covered by warranty.   I would be happy to sit down with you and go over what was replaced and what warranty options you have.  Of course this would require this to be a legitimate review that has actually done business with us. Having only 3 reviews all of them one star and hundreds if not thousands of miles apart seems suspicious.  In the future I would recommend a more convincing fake name and maybe use a different profile for reviews in New York  and Alabama when you are leaving fictitious reviews.

name: Nicfin36
text: Jay did an awesome job fabricating a metal hydraulic line for my tractor. Top notch work. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We always enjoy feedback good or bad but it's especially nice to hear when we do a good job

name: Jerrid Seiler
text: Best custom hoses to be had. Quality of materials and service is actually 6 star worthy. I have never waited more than  10 minutes for anything.

name: Jed Hadley
text: Great business! Very nice and knowledgeable anything to do with diesel trucks and equipment.

name: wade harris
text: Excellent service and great people

name: Randy Aldridge
text: Been dealing with them over 2o yrs

name: Dewayne Bowie
text: Great service
